name: Lunch Crush
description:
It's lunch time! 

Lunch Crush is a casual arcade action game where you must deliver food to customers quickly in order to keep your store running. Run, pick up and place food, and kick it around in order to manage your stock and get those orders out! Earn bigger profits and unique rewards each day to boost your score!

- 20+ unique food items to stock your store!
- Fun and addictive scoring system to keep you chasing those high scores!
- Relive the nostalgia of your favourite handhelds with retro pixel art! 
- Lots of color palettes to choose from!
- Gamepad support!

Are you ready to serve?!
